title: "Palantir's Artificial Intelligence (AI) Strategy Is Genius. Here's Why"
excerpt: "When it comes to artificial intelligence (AI), Palantir(NYSE: PLTR) is emerging as one of the most talked about companies. The elusive data analytics enterprise founded by Peter Thiel appears to be on a mission to prove that its AI capabilities can compete with the likes of big tech stalwarts Microsoft, Alphabet, and Amazon."
